content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we can discuss the rental price of my apartment. Please make an offer, and we can negotiate from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and consideration. I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. Would you be willing to start at 800 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm not willing to start at that price. I'm looking for a higher price for my apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. How about 900 Euro per month? I think this is a fair price for the location and amenities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 900 Euro per month is still too low for my liking. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of my property. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mister Schmidt. How about 950 Euro per month? This is a good price for both parties, I believe.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 950 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Would 975 Euro per month be more acceptable? This would be a fair deal for the apartment's location and condition.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 975 Euro per month is still not high enough for me. I'm looking for a price that truly reflects the value of my property. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your desire for a competitive price, Mister Schmidt. How about 1000 Euro per month? This is a common market rate for similar apartments in the area.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 1000 Euro per month is a more acceptable offer, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
